about_the_game:
Exiled from an organisation of elite killers, and now being hunted by them. You’re on a mission to take them down and get back your life. Take out the local, national, international and ultimately the global head of the organisation in order to bring them to their knees once and for all.

Choosing from 5 unique specialists, battle through waves of hand crafted encounters, taking on bosses with brutal raid-like mechanics. Work through 4 zones to secure your freedom, and once you’ve done that, prove you truly are the best with end-game modifiers for a near limitless challenge.

For transparency the screenshots are updated throughout the development process and as such do not fully represent the final product

-----

Features

  • Meta-progression in the form of base upgrades, allowing you to continually push towards eventual success
  • Upgradeable 'Tech' that provide boosts in power, while changing up the way you play your specialist, giving each run a slight twist.
  • 40+ cards for each specialist, along with a further 40 powerful but dispensable equipment cards available to all specialists.
  • A variety of enemy groups, each crafted to provide a unique challenge.
  • Bosses with raid-like mechanics which you need to figure out how to counter, or face swift destruction.
  • 4 Zones of increasing difficulty.
  • Modifier system for post-completion to give skilled players the opportunity to push themselves to the limit.

What's in Early Access

In the Early Access build you'll find:
  • The first 2 zones
  • 3 complete specialists
  • A large selection of base upgrades

What's coming in the future

We plan to deliver the remainder of the roadmap in several updates through the life of Early Access, with the goal of the final release to contain:
  • All 5 zones
  • All 5 complete specialists
  • All base upgrades
  • Multiple bosses per zone
  • End-Game Modifier system

short_description: Rogue-lite deck-builder set in the gritty neo-noir world of assassins and killers. Play as one of 5 unique specialists, power up with permanent upgrades, beat the game and then strap in for the next ride with end-game modifiers for near limitless challenge.
